name: からかい上手の高木さんVR 1学期
summary: Virtually experience the playful and relentless teasing of heroine, Takagi-san, in Teasing Master Takagi-san VR - 1st Semester (Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san VR). With sales of the original comic series exceeding 8.2 million copies in Japan, the romantic comedy makes its debut on as a VR animation.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 开发: KAYAC Inc.
  • 发行: KAYAC Inc.
  • 发行日期: 2020年5月21日
